name: Akuma (Futuregames)
description:
Being cute doesn`t mean you can`t go to Hell! Find your way out of a demonic world, where being fast is all that matters!

You`re Bob, a curious cat trapped in a hostile environment. Explore unfamiliar areas, discover secrets and gain avilities as you fight your way back home.

Try to escape as fast as you can or take the time to explore! The choice is yours to make!

Key features:

- Classic side scrolling action.

- Precise 2D controls. Whip your tail, doublejump and walljump your way through Hell.

- Choose your own path! You decide which enemies you face and how you make your way forward.

- A contrast of cute and creepy environments and characters.
